description: Pendix is a German company that sells kits that allow bicyclists to upgrade their normal bicycles into e-Bikes. These kits are referred to as eDrives.

Pendix retailers and service partners can service eDrives using the Pendix Service App for Android . Among other things, the Service App allows retailers and partners to install new firmware on eDrives. These firmware updates are distributed as PXF files.
While PXF files contain some human-readable information, they are not meant to be manually opened by users. Instead, they are meant to be transmitted to and installed on an eDrive.
